Race.SpecificTitle: PW Prop. No. 1 -- 2.13 Mills Renewal - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of Caldwell, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), levy a special tax of two and thirteen hundredths (2.13) mills on all property subject to taxation in the Parish (an estimated $123,640 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2018 and ending with the year 2027, for the purpose of maintaining, operating and supporting a public health unit within the Parish?

Race.SpecificTitle: PW Prop. No. 2 -- 3.31 Mills Renewal - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of Caldwell, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), levy a special tax of three and thirty-one hundredths (3.31) mills on all property subject to taxation in the Parish (an estimated $191,700 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2018 and ending with the year 2027, to promote the economic development of the Parish through the funding of programs for the encouragement of the location of industries and businesses in the Parish and the encouragement of additions to existing industries and businesses located therein?

Race.SpecificTitle: PW Cons. Sch. Dist. 1 Prop. No. 1 -- 5.39 Mills Renewal - SB - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Consolidated School District Number One Propositions
Proposition No. 1
(Tax Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall Consolidated School District Number One of Caldwell Parish, Louisiana (the "District"), levy a five and thirty-nine hundredths (5.39) mills tax on all the property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $306,152 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2017 and ending with the year 2026, for the purpose of constructing and improving school houses and buildings in the District and/or for the purpose of operating and maintaining the public school buildings and school related facilities of the District?

Race.SpecificTitle: PW Cons. Sch. Dist. 1 Prop. No. 2 -- 11.32 Mills Renewal - SB - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Consolidated School District Number One Propositions
Proposition No. 2
(Tax Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall Consolidated School District Number One of Caldwell Parish, Louisiana (the "District"), levy an eleven and thirty-two hundredths (11.32) mills tax on all the property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $644,108 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2017 and ending with the year 2026, for the purpose of giving additional support to public elementary and secondary schools within the District?

Race.SpecificTitle: Kelly Water District -- 10 Mills Renewal - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall Kelly Water District, Caldwell Parish, Louisiana (the "District"), levy a special tax of ten (10) mills on all the property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $36,840 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2018 and ending with the year 2027, for the purpose of constructing, acquiring, improving, maintaining and operating the District's waterworks system, including property, equipment and facilities necessary therefor?
